faqs.question: What are the typical sizes of a 3 BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 22 and what should I expect regarding carpet area versus super area
faqs.answer: The size of a 3 BHK flat in Sector 22 varies significantly based on the builder and the specific project design. Generally, you can expect the super area to range from 1400 sq ft to 2200 sq ft. It is vital to understand the difference carpet area is the usable space within the walls, while super area includes common areas, balconies, shafts, and staircases. We always emphasize reviewing the RERA documents to confirm the actual carpet area, ensuring you pay for the maximum usable space possible.
